description: When you have very dry, rough, irritated skin you need something that will moisturize to help it heal fast. In our Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Unscented lotion, we've combined healing micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly and our highest levels of moisturizing glycerin. The result is a rich lotion that gives you intense moisturization. This lotion deeply moisturizes to heal very dry skin in only 5 days. Suitable for Sensitive SkinOur Advanced Repair, Unscented lotion isn't just your average moisturizer. Clinically proven to heal dry skin in 5 days, it provides prescription strength moisturization without the prescription to restore soft, healthy looking skin.It's also been awarded the U.S. National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Lotions for eczema related dryness and for sensitive skin need to be gentle on the skin yet contain nourishing ingredients to effectively tackle the issue of dryness head on. With its seal of approval from the NEA, Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Unscented Lotion is suitable to use as a daily moisturizer for people with eczema or sensitive skin.Fast-healing MoistureVaseline Intensive Care Lotion, Advanced Repair helps to relieve dry skin from the first application. It contains micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly, which penetrate deep down to form a protective layer on your skin and lock in moisture. This sealing barrier speeds up the skin's natural barrier recovery. Advanced Repair lotion also contains glycerin and dimethicone, which draw moisture to the skin to rehydrate very dry skin. With this combination of deeply moisturizing ingredients, Vaseline Advanced Repair lotion offers you fast relief for dry, itchy skin, plus the confidence that it is suitable for sensitive skin.Apply Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Unscented Lotion to your skin daily to heal dry skin. Healthy-looking skin can be yours with the right lotions for dry, itchy skin.

description: Differin Gel is the FIRST and ONLY FDA-approved full prescription strength retinoid acne treatment now available without a prescription. Until now, 99% of all OTC acne medications in the US used only two different types of active ingredients. Differin Gel contains adapalene, a multi-benefit dermatologist recommended retinoid that clears and prevents acne which helps restore your skin's natural tone and texture. It is the newest active ingredient in OTC acne in over 30 years. Now you can clear your acne with the power of Rx.Directions:A 45 g tube of Differin can be used once a day, every day, up to a 90 day supply. A 15g tube of Differin can be used once a day, every day, up to a 30 day supply. 1. CLEANSE: Wash your face with a gentle, non-drying cleanser like Differin Balancing Cleanser.2. TREAT: Differin Gel is not used in the same way as a spot treatment. In order to get the best results,spread a thin layer over your face, once a day, every day. 3. MOISTURIZE: To help maintain healthy skin, use a moisturizer like Differin Balancing Moisturizer after each application. Use of a moisturizer may help decrease dryness and other signs of irritation Ingredients:Active ingredient: Adapalene 0.1% (retinoid)Inactive ingredient: carbomer 940, edetate disodium, methylparaben, poloxamer 182, propylene glycol, purified water and sodium hydroxide. May contain hydrochloric acid to adjust pH.

description: Differin Gel is the FIRST and ONLY FDA-approved full prescription strength retinoid acne treatment now available without a prescription. Until now, 99% of all OTC acne medications in the US used only two different types of active ingredients. Differin Gel contains adapalene, a multi-benefit dermatologist recommended retinoid that clears and prevents acne which helps restore your skin's natural tone and texture. It is the newest active ingredient in OTC acne in over 30 years. Now you can clear your acne with the power of Rx.Directions:A 45 g tube of Differin can be used once a day, every day, up to a 90 day supply. A 15g tube of Differin can be used once a day, every day, up to a 30 day supply. 1. CLEANSE: Wash your face with a gentle, non-drying cleanser like Differin Balancing Cleanser.2. TREAT: Differin Gel is not used in the same way as a spot treatment. In order to get the best results,spread a thin layer over your face, once a day, every day. 3. MOISTURIZE: To help maintain healthy skin, use a moisturizer like Differin Balancing Moisturizer after each application. Use of a moisturizer may help decrease dryness and other signs of irritation..Ingredients:Active ingredient: Adapalene 0.1% (retinoid)Inactive ingredient: carbomer 940, edetate disodium, methylparaben, poloxamer 182, propylene glycol, purified water and sodium hydroxide. May contain hydrochloric acid to adjust pH.

description:
Convenient and easy to use, these Sublime Bronze Towelettes deliver a streak-free, natural looking tan. With enough self-tanner for one application, each towelette is perfect for at home or on the go. Made with vitamin E and gentle AHAs* to provide a beautiful, 100% natural-looking tan and ultra-smooth skin. Results may vary. Continue to use Sublime Bronze until you have reached your desired level of tan. *With alpha hydroxyl acid (AHA) derivative.

Step 1: Cleanse and exfoliate skin. Step 2: Smooth towelette all over body, unfolding as needed. Step 3: Use sparingly around ankles, knees, and elbows. Step 4: Wash hands thoroughly after use. Step 5: Use daily until you have achieved the desired level of tan, and then apply 1-2 times a week. Best if used within 6 months of purchase.

This product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn. This product contains alpha hydroxyl acid (aha) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Repeated exposure of unprotected skin while tanning may increase the risk of skin aging, skin cancer and other harmful effects to the skin even if you do not burn. Use sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

description: Pacifica SPF 30 Mineral Clear Lip BalmSuncare + Lipcare100% vegan and cruelty-freeWhat it is: A hydrating lip balm with the added benefits of SPF protection. Scented with natural coconut for a true beach vibe- no matter where your adventures may happen. What else you should know: Remember, your sunscreen only works if you use it correctly! Shake this can well as it contains suspended minerals that you need for best results. Apply liberally to all exposed skin. SPF numbers are determined in a lab. In the real world, no matter what the SPF, sunscreens start to lose effectiveness over time (2 hours max). So it's important to reapply every two hours or less and after swimming or heavy sweating. The most important factor is that you need to use enough sunscreen for adequate protection. And while our sunscreens apply evenly and can have a more translucent look, they work as a block and you need to cover your skin completely for effective results. What else you should know: Every true beauty knows it's what's on the inside that matters.Formulated without petroleum, parabens, silicones, retinyl palmitate, phthalates & chemical UV absorbers.Directions. Sun damage is serious and sunscreens are only effective if you use them properly!

Step 1: Cleanse and exfoliate skin. Step 2: Apply evenly all over body as you would a lotion. Use sparingly around ankles. knees, and elbows. Step 3: Wash hands thoroughly after use. Step 4: Let skin dry before putting on clothes. Step 5: Use daily until you have achieved the desired level of tan, and then apply 1-2 times a week. Best if used within 6 months of purchase.

WARNING SUNBURN ALERT: THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT CONTAIN A SUNSCREEN AND DOES NOT PROTECT AGAINST SUNBURN. THIS PRODUCT CONTAINS AN ALPHA HYDROXY ACID (AHA) THAT MAY INCREASE YOUR SKIN’S SENSITIVITY TO THE SUN AND PARTICULARLY THE POSSIBILITY OF SUNBURN. REPEATED EXPOSURE OF UNPROTECTED SKIN WHILE TANNING MAY INCREASE THE RISK OF SKIN AGING, SKIN CANCER, AND OTHER HARMFUL EFFECTS TO THE SKIN EVEN IF YOU DO NOT BURN. USE SUNSCREEN.

description:
Skin's moisture barrier weakens with age, resulting in greater moisture loss, more prominent wrinkles and loss of firmness. Lightweight, protective cream is formulated with Pro-Retinol, a powerful wrinkle-fighting ingredient and Centella Asiatica, a herb used in traditional Chinese medicine. Strengthens and repairs the kin barrier to help resist visible lines, loss of firmness and other signs of aging that a weakened skin barrier can accentuate. See visible results immediately: skin feels healthier, softer, smoother and more supple. Skin feels noticeably more hydrated. Skin barrier is stronger, helping to resist signs of aging. In two weeks: fine lines appear visibly reduced. Firmness and elasticity look noticeably improved. In four weeks: wrinkles appear less visible. Clarity and tone improves, skin exudes luminosity. Skin continues to look and feel soft, smooth, healthy.

Fragrance free, paraben free, non-greasy finish, allergy-tested

Every morning and evening, smooth over the face until thoroughly absorbed.

description:
Vaseline® Lip Therapy® Rosy Lips Tin has been clinically proven to help heal dry lips, and it gives your lips a natural, rosy shine. This tinted lip balm has a non-sticky formula that melts into lips to lock in moisture while enhancing your lip color. Our Vaseline® lip balm tins are convenient, so you can take them with you in your bag, purse, or pocket, and moisturize whenever your lips feel dry.
Natural, Rosy Shine
When you have dry lips, the last thing you want is to make them worse. Vaseline Lip Therapy® Rosy Lips truly moisturizes while also bringing out lips' natural rosy tones. This tinted lip moisturizer provides a glossy look with a hint of pink – and you'll love the scent that has elements of rose, vanilla, and red berry.
Made with the Original Wonder Jelly
Like all Vaseline® lip products, this formula is made with pure Vaseline® Jelly that has been protecting and helping to heal dry skin since 1870. This product brings you the dry skin healing benefits of our original Jelly in a formula custom designed for lips, so Vaseline Lip Therapy® Rosy Lips is a lip balm you can trust.
Locks in Moisture
The top protective layer of skin on your lips is thinner than on the rest of your body, and can be more susceptible to dryness. Vaseline® Rosy Lips tin is a moisturizing lip balm that penetrates into lips rather than simply sitting on the surface. description:
nügg Deep Cleansing Face Mask - 0.33oz

Meet the best face mask for clear skin. Get clean pores and shine-free skin with the Deep Cleansing Face Mask

2014 & 2015 Allure Best of Beauty Award Winner.

This single-use Deep Cleansing face mask contains a powerful blend of precious natural oils and extracts for a clean, shine-free look and a soft skin feel in just 5 to 10 minutes. It is formulated with 98% natural or naturally-derived ingredients and with a powerful blend of precious natural oils and extracts. Key ingredients include Witch Hazel extract and Cucumber extract which act as astringents to reduce the appearance of pore size, Jojoba Lite Oil to help dissolve sebum in a gentle, healthy way and Aloe Juice and Glycerin to hydrate and soothe skin. The result of this 3-in-1 face mask action is clean yet well hydrated, soothed and silky-matte skin!

nügg facial masks are formulated without petrochemicals, synthetic fragrances, synthetic colors, sulfates and parabens. Each of the 5 facial masks in the pack comes in a unique single serve capsule (made from recyclable PETG) which protects the formula from oxidation and also makes the masks highly travel friendly. nügg's break-through natural oil dispersion skin care technology enhances the mask's efficacy and eliminates the need for possibly damaging active chemical emulsifiers.

Direction of use: Apply content of the cup generously to skin (applies like a smooth gel), leaving out lips and eye area. Leave on skin for 5 to 10 minutes before rinsing off or removing with a damp washcloth. Use as often as desired.

description:
Boost your skin’s hydration on the go, with our first ever hydrating booster: made with skin-loving ingredients, minerals, a plant extract and no harsh chemicals that can upset your skin. Lightweight and silky in texture, Simple Water Boost Hydrating Booster delivers instant moisture to thirsty skin, reversing dehydration symptoms such as dry, tight feeling or tired-looking skin and leaving it looking and feeling healthy and soft to the touch.

During the day your body continually works to maintain hydration levels, to keep your skin in its best condition. Factors such as air pollution, harsh weather, temperature changes, air conditioning, stress, and lack of sleep can cause your natural hydration cycle to get out of balance and as a result, skin can become dry and dehydrated.
Specially developed with skin-essential ingredients, minerals and a plant extract, Simple Water Boost Hydrating Booster absorbs down into skin (the stratum corneum) to enable long-lasting hydration .

Our booster gives you on-demand hydration: you decide the level of hydration that’s right for your skin, by choosing how to apply it and how much to use. Use pre-moisturizer as an all-over hydrating primer; mix with your facial moisturizer for long lasting hydration, or apply directly to specific dehydrated or dry areas on your face.

Its lightweight, hydrating formula instantly quenches thirsty skin, smoothing away tightness and dryness for providing long-lasting hydration. Skin feels more comfortable, supple and looks naturally dewy-fresh with every use.

The Simple Water Boost Hydrating Booster is part of the new Simple Water Boost skincare range dedicated to reversing the 5 early symptoms of dehydration: dryness, roughness, feelings of tightness, dullness and dry dehydration lines; to leave skin revitalized, supple and dewy fresh. Why not try our other products as part of your hydration skincare routine? We recommend cleansing your face with the Simple Water Boost Micellar Facial Gel Wash or Simple Water Boost Micellar Cleansing Water, before applying the Simple Water Boost Hydrating Booster, and finishing with your favorite Simple daily face moisturizer.
title: Simple Water Hydrating Booster - 0.85oz

bullets: Get instant hydration on demand with our first ever Hydrating Booster.
Specifically designed to reverse 5 symptoms of early dehydration such as dry, rough, tight, dull looking skin or dry dehydrated lines, making it ideal for dry, dehydrated or sensitive skin.
Lightweight formulation instantly quenches thirsty skin, making it look and feel healthy, supple and soft to the touch.
Smooths away tightness and dryness.
Contains skin essential minerals and a plant extract that work like an invisible plaster to lock in moisture and provide long-lasting hydration.
Simple Water Boost Hydrating Booster contains no harsh chemicals, artificial colors or perfume that may upset your skin.

description:
Soak in gorgeous skin! Naturally you can count on Alba Botanica to deliver botanically-infused alternatives to the latest home beauty craze to hit the continent in years. These innovative and convenient treatments are individually wrapped, serum-soaked fiber masks that contour to your face to deliver concentrated doses of active botanical ingredients. To use, simply lay a mask over your face and smooth around curves. After 5 to 15 minutes of intense kin rehab, simply dispose of the mask, massage the remaining serum into skin and smile at your complexion. Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. We make a full range of products packed with potent, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair. Because we are committed to the health and happiness of all furry friends, we never test our products, or the ingredients that go into them, on animals. We recognize the need to be good stewards of all natural resources. So we try to do beautiful by reducing our environmental impact in everything we do as a business. With our products, the way that we make them, and how we treat others, we want to inspire and uplift women from head to soul.
-Individually wrapped, serum-soaked fiber mask

description:
As your skin matures, its ability to renew surface cells slows down, causing a buildup of dead skin cells on the surface. As a result, the natural pink tone is hidden and complexion becomes dull, losing its natural rosy tone of youth. L’Oréal Skin Laboratories have developed a powerful yet refreshing gel facial mask treatment, infused with peony extract, AHA (Fruit Acids), and a Mineral exfoliant that revives skin’s rosy tone in just 5 minutes. Age Perfect Cell Renewal Rosy Tone Mask is formulated as an intensive anti-aging treatment to exfoliate dead skin cells through the action of AHA Fruit Acids and the physical exfoliation delivered by an ultra-fine mineral exfoliant. As a result, skin feels instantly refreshed, with a renewed, rosy blush. After just 5 minutes of this powerful yet gentle antiaging face mask, skin has a radiant and healthy glow and is better prepped to absorb our intensely moisturizing Rosy Tone Cream. After 4 weeks of using our Rosy Tone Cream, women saw fresher-looking, softer skin with a healthy, rosy blush.

Dermatologist tested for safety, Non-greasy

Apply mask to a clean face avoiding the eye area. Leave on for 5 minutes. Gently massage mask into skin using light, circular motions to help exfoliate. Rinse off with water. For best results use 2 times per week. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately and thoroughly with water.

description:
Made from the nut of the African Shea Tree, OKAY African Shea Butter is a rich Butter that has been clinically proven to provide many benefits. DIRECTIONS FOR USE:

For Skin: Try and Scoop Up or Rub off some Shea Butter from inside the jar. Apply to area of use by massage into skin while spreading throughout. (In cold areas Shea Butter may become very hard. Simply place the Shea Jar (closed) into hot water. Let it sit for 5 min then Shea Butter should become more Manageable.)

For Hair: Apply Shea Butter to hair directly and leave in. Make sure to massage and comb to evenly spread. Shea Butter can also be applied as a liquid. So you can place a small amount of Shea Butter from the container into small pot and warm up on the stove. Warm up just enough so that the Shea Butter becomes liquid. (Do not over heat, nor warm up so that it is too hot to handle) Apply to hair from roots to tips avoiding the scalp. Spread evenly and sit with a cap for 30 min then rinse May be used as a leave in also.



Ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Raw Shea Butter),

description:
Make P:rem's Layering Me. Firming Mask, inspired by the layering ideology in Korean beauty, contains two sheet masks soaked in two unique essence formulas that, when layered, combine to reveal radiant, glowing-from-within skin in one step. The Firming Mask is applied first to deliver potent circulation-boosting ingredients such as Strawberry, Ginger, Royal Jelly, Honey, Blueberry and Licorice. The Moisture Mask, made of face-shaping Tension fibers, is layered on top to aid in the lifting and tightening of the skin while the moisturizing essence sinks through the Firming Mask to provide deep hydration.
How to Use:
In morning or evening, follow the below steps for a complete masking experience.
Step 1: Apply Firming Mask to clean, dry skin after cleansing and toning.
Step 2: Apply Moisture mask over Step 1, hooking the holes to the right and left of the cheeks around the ears. Use the bottom ear loops to gently pull the chin taut and upward, hooking the second set of ear loops around each ear. Wear for 30 minutes, then remove. Pat excess essence gently into the skin until absorbed. Follow up with serum if desired and finish with moisturizer to lock in hydration.

description:
Rubber masks have long been a Korean celebrity spa staple due to its superior hydrating, detoxifying and soothing benefits to the skin. When applied to skin, the formula 'rubberizes' to the contours of the face, allowing mineral-rich nutrients to be effectively absorbed without the risk of evaporation. The rubberized mask also peels away cleanly, leaving skin fresh and clarified after each treatment.

The MD's Pick Pore Clear Rubber Mask is a next generation 'water rubber mask' that imparts soothing comfort to irritated, trouble-prone skin. This cooling treatment is infused with a blend of naturally anti-inflammatory botanicals such as tea tree, rosemary, and camellia extracts to calm the skin. This at-home spa mask is also enriched with soothing centella extract and revitalizing ginger extract to strengthen and calm the skin.

To Use: Mix the gel base with the powder in the provided tray to create a gel. Apply a thick layer of the mask to cleansed and toned skin and leave on for 10~15 minutes. Peel away and discard mask after use. Use moisturizer afterwards to lock in hydration.
title: MD's Pick Water Rubber Mask - Pore Clear - 1ct

description:
Made from the nut of the African Shea Tree, OKAY African Shea Butter is a rich Butter that has been clinically proven to provide many benefits. DIRECTIONS FOR USE:

For Skin: Try and Scoop Up or Rub off some Shea Butter from inside the jar. Apply to area of use by massage into skin while spreading throughout. (In cold areas Shea Butter may become very hard. Simply place the Shea Jar (closed) into hot water. Let it sit for 5 min then Shea Butter should become more Manageable.)

For Hair: Apply Shea Butter to hair directly and leave in. Make sure to massage and comb to evenly spread. Shea Butter can also be applied as a liquid. So you can place a small amount of Shea Butter from the container into small pot and warm up on the stove. Warm up just enough so that the Shea Butter becomes liquid. (Do not over heat, nor warm up so that it is too hot to handle) Apply to hair from roots to tips avoiding the scalp. Spread evenly and sit with a cap for 30 min then rinse May be used as a leave in also.



Ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Raw Shea Butter),
